Treeverse Season 1 Is Now Live!

Endless Clouds Updates
Treeverse Season 1 Is Now Live!
Share

Treeverse Season 1 Is Now Live!

We relaunched the campaign after insane demand overloaded the logins last week.

A 3 week (21 days) reward campaign has initiated. Season 1 begins on 27th of April and ends on the 18th of May. A final snapshot will be taken at the end and distributed based on the categories below.

Download the game here.

Download

[NOTE 4:28 PM GST 27TH APRIL SUNDAY:

Login issues have been solved from last week. We've identified 3 more that are not major :

- Loading on 30% then disconnect (try again; different servers)

- Freeze in dungeons (wait a bit, or restart)

- Random disconnects (can login again, but dungeons reset)

They do not impact all players but we are looking into fixing all 3 but as soon as possible. We think this is a better approach than rescheduling another launch, if need be we will extend the campaign.]

Reward Allocation & Eligibility

2.76% of $END supply and some $IMX/$MON will be distributed as rewards for this campaign.

*Rewards will be determined by 3 categories:

  • Active Users

    • Completing one daily quest gives you 100 points (max 3K points)

    • Equal reward distribution between points

  • Skilling Masters

    • Max out all Skilling to level 60 & reach Level 30

    • Equal split between all eligible players

  • Leaderboards

    • Based on End Game Dungeon Runs, Gold, XP and Monster Shards Collected

    • Only for top 20% of users, weighted rewards to the top

    • $IMX and $MON rewards

*All require 1 NFT (~$5) to be purchased for campaign eligibility. If you own a Plot/Timeless/Nftree and have connected your wallet you will automatically be eligible.

Rewards are weighted towards grinders and high level players. There is also a final multiplier at the end of the campaign:

  • Partners: Hold $100 in $IMX/$MON (1.25X)

    • Note: It is $100 value as of the last snapshot date 17th May 2025

  • Own a Treeverse Plot or Timeless NFT (1.5X)

  • Own a Nftrees NFT (1.75X)

Multipliers do NOT stack, the highest will take priority. Make sure to connect your wallet to your Immutable zkEVM address ahead of time!

Rewards will not come directly at the end of the campaign as $END is pre-TGE. At TGE, the reward allocation will be 100% unlocked with no vesting or play-to-unlock. $END will be a high circulating-token. It will be no earlier than 1 month after end of reward campaign. And please balance expecatations.

NFTs: Packs, Boosts and Crowns

Available in USDC/ETH, you can purchase here on this site.

Season 1 Store

These NFTs are on Immutable zkEVM so you have to bridge over if you havent already.

SBT: Both Packs and Boosts (meaning they CANNOT be traded after purchase).

Tradable: Crowns. We have 4 different types of Crowns that will be an open mint for 30 days with a max limit of 1 per address.

**Due to App Store rules, you cannot use NFTs on iOS. We have many clear disclaimers on the site. You can still use them on Android & Windows. Refunds will not be offered.**

Rules

  • No botting

  • No autoclickers

  • No multi accounting

We have the option to ban and blacklist you from the campaign if weve noticed any wrongdoing, even if you purchased any NFTs. There will be an appeal form.

FAQ

Where and when do I have to buy the NFT for reward eligibility?

You can purchase on this link. The latest you have to purchase for reward eligibility is Day 20. We take a snapshot on Day 21.

Cant login or facing crashes?

Ensure you are not using a VPN (causes grey screen) and are on the correct server version by updating your application. If you are stuck on 30% on loading, keep trying and testing different servers (it auto fixes).

If you still have any other issues, let us know in Discord.

Why are leaderboards not public?

Although weve announced criteria and are distributing rewards, we dont want this to become a pure farming game. This also allows us to internally simulate many different weightings to the reward campaign at the end to get the fairest result.

If you feel this is unfair, you do not need to play.

Will data be reset again?

Season 1 will continue after the reward campaign. In the future when we launch Season 2, which will be determined by major upgrades and adjustments to the game, we will do another reset. That is not planned to release anytime soon.

Can I play this game on Mac?

No. We currently support downloads on App Store, Play Store and Epic Games only.

Do Plots, Timeless and Nftrees have any usecase in-game?

Our genesis collections do not have any specific usecase in Season 1. They will just count for free reward eligibility and reward multipliers. The specific usecase will be implemented in the future.

Where can I stay updated?

Please join our Discord to be the first to hear when new announcements drop. And subscribe to our Substack.
